Text: Downloads into an MKV file which barely ANY players can actually play, and it's a pain in the arse to convert.
I have no troubles with mkv files. Try using GOM Player, VLC Player, or get a codec pack from filehippo.com
What's MKV? I doubt it will play through my portable harddisk.
What the hell are you talking about bad mkv files? Try using VLC player not sh*t like DickX (originally DivX) or Windows Live Player!!!!!!!!
2011 and someone actually complained about a .mkv file being this new, mystical, unplayable format.  Pathetic.
